title: PluginCapabilities
description: Describes the declarative capabilities of a plugin, such as supported importers.

importers.description: List of supported modpack importers provided by the plugin.

id.description: Unique identifier for the importer (lowercase, kebab/underscore allowed).

description.description: Optional description of what this importer does.

icon.description: Optional icon file name or URL for the importer.

fieldLabel.description: Optional field label for the importer.
